item.title: VINCE HOLDING CORP 10-K
item.description: VINCE HOLDING CORP, which is in the Retail-Apparel & Accessory Stores [5600] industry, SEC 10-K filing on April 30, 2021 had 40971 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 590 instances 1 - 431 instances fiscal - 350 instances vince - 350 instances 2020 - 308 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
